name.label: Dataset Name
name.description: Dataset name. 120 character limit. A  descriptive title that describes what, when and where​ ​data was collected​.

sites.label: Dataset Site
sites.description: Site this dataset was collected from.

plots.label: Dataset Plots
plots.description: Plot identification where dataset was collected.

authors.label: Dataset Author
authors.description: List the main researchers involved in producing the data, or the authors of the publication who should be listed in the citation for this data.

originating_institution.label: Dataset Originating Institution
originating_institution.description: Name of the organization that performed the research or issued the dataset. Separate multiple organizations with a semicolon and a space.

contact.label: Dataset Contact
contact.description: Name of contact person for the dataset.

variables.label: Dataset Variables
variables.description: Measurement Variables in Dataset (select all that apply).

qaqc_status.label: Status of dataset QA/QC
qaqc_status.description: Choices are None, Initial QA-QC, Final QA-QC.

ngee_tropics_resources.label: Indicate whether NGEE Tropics Resources (financial, personnel etc.) were used to obtain this dataset. The NGEE Tropics Internal Data Policy will apply, if checked 'yes'
ngee_tropics_resources.description: Datasets using NGEE Tropics resources (financial, personnel etc.) will automatically be set to 'NGEE Tropics' access within 6 months of submission (regardless of what access the user specified), and to 'Public' within 18 months of submission.

funding_organizations.label: Dataset Funding organizations
funding_organizations.description: Identify the agencies and offices that funded the work in the dataset separate multiple funders with a comma and a space.

doe_funding_contract_numbers.label: DOE Funding Contract Numbers
doe_funding_contract_numbers.description: List the numbers of any DOE contract under which the work was funded. If no DOE funding for this dataset or field is empty set as 'NONE'. If the dataset is a result of a joint effort between two or more DOE Site/Facility Management Contractors, etc., additional DOE contract numbers may be entered. The 'DE' should not be included as a part of the number.

additional_reference_information.label: Additional Information about Dataset Reference
additional_reference_information.description: Brief description of paper relevance or other comments.

access_level.label: Dataset Access level
access_level.description: Choices are Public, NGEE Tropics, Limited (provide access comments), Private.  Datasets using NGT resources will automatically be set to 'NGEE Tropics' access within 6 months of submission (regardless of what the user specified), and to 'Public' within 18 months of submission.

additional_access_information.label: Additional Information about Dataset Access
additional_access_information.description: Provide comments, if necessary regarding data access. If access is to be limited, mention who can have access to the data.
